Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Reroute at Foster/Western
ShortDescription: #92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Foster, Western, Lawrence, Damen, then resume their normal route.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Foster, Western, Lawrence, Damen,  then resume their normal route, due to police activity at Foster/Western.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 79th
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 79th due to a mechanical problem  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 79th due to a mechanical problem .


Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
